text: Camila Maria Leiria de Castro (born 8 May 1982) is a Brazilian Paralympic sitting volleyball player. She is part of the Brazil women's national sitting volleyball team. She won the bronze medal, Brazil's first in the sport, at the 2016 Summer Paralympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, after defeating the Ukrainian women's national sitting volleyball team by 3 sets to 0. == References == == Other websites == * MARIA LEIRIA de CASTRO Camila. www.paralympic.org Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Brazil
title: Camila Maria Leiria de Castro
